entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy changing to freezing rain near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
